SerialInterface.description: The SerialInterface schema describes an asynchronous serial interface, such as an RS-232 interface, available to a system or device.
SerialInterface.longDescription: This resource shall represent a serial interface as part of the Redfish Specification.

title: #SerialInterface.SerialInterface
